CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide 2a,b with 3-thienylboronic acid gave 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione ( 3a,b ).

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. dibromide 2a,b
2. 3-thienylboronic acid
3. 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Name in the given paragraph:

1. 3-thienylboronic acid
2. 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 3-thienylboronic acid |
| 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide 2a,b with 3-thienylboronic acid gave 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione ( 3a,b ).

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* 2a,b (a and b are variables representing the stereoisomers of the dibromide)
* 3a,b (a and b are variables representing the stereoisomers of the 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione)

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* 2a
* 2b
* 3a
* 3b
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

* 3a,b (a and b are variables representing the stereoisomers of the 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione)

So, the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the paragraph are:

* 3a
* 3b

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 3a |
| 3b |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide 2a,b with 3-thienylboronic acid gave 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione ( 3a,b ).

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* 2a,b: dibromide
* 3a,b: 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione
* 3-thienylboronic acid: 3-thienylboronic acid
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to Value of Material Property:

* 3a,b: 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (a and b refer to the stereoisomers of the compound)

The entity "2a,b" does not refer to a material property, it is a reference to the starting material used in the reaction.

The entity "3-thienylboronic acid" does not refer to a material property, it is a reference to a reagent used in the reaction.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the valid entities:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b) |

Note that the "a" and "b" subscripts are included in the entity name, as they are part of the chemical name of the compound.
